title: 7 Kindle Keywords: Use all 50 Characters or Not?
description:
When first go to upload your book to Amazon you will be asked to fill in your 7 kindle keyword boxes with keywords you believe are the best for your book.  Now there have been a lot of questions regarding how to best utilize these boxes and get the most out of them for your book. 

In this video, we will cover all the information that was gathered when using over 100 users' books. After this video, you will understand how to make sure you are getting the best usage out of these keywords.

You can find the complete article about filling your 7 kindle keywords here: https://kindlepreneur.com/7-kindle-keywords/

Find the perfect keywords with Publisher Rocket: https://publisherrocket.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_term=kindle-keywords&utm_content=&utm_campaign=publisher-rocket
